description: Returns a list of scheduled messages.
name: chat.scheduledMessages.list

channel.description: The channel of the scheduled messages

cursor.description: For pagination purposes, this is the `cursor` value returned from a previous call to `chat.scheduledmessages.list` indicating where you want to start this call from.

latest.description: A UNIX timestamp of the latest value in the time range

limit.description: Maximum number of original entries to return.

oldest.description: A UNIX timestamp of the oldest value in the time range
